decks.notes: The deck aims to generate a large amount of life gain through creatures like Wildgrowth Walker and Amalia Benavides Aguirre, while also using cards like Aetherflux Reservoir to deal damage based on the amount of life gained. Cards like Collected Company and Chord of Calling help to find key combo pieces quickly, while protection cards like Selfless Savior and Skyclave Apparition help to keep the combo pieces safe. The deck focuses on assembling the combo pieces quickly and efficiently to overwhelm the opponent with a sudden burst of life gain and damage.
